Uses of Package
controller

Packages that use controller
Package
Description
controller
 
  • Classes in controller used by controller
    Class
    Description
    DataController
    The DataController class contains the app's logic for loading the user database and saving user data to it
    LoginController
    LoginController handles user interactions during the login process
    PongGameController
    The PongController class contains the main logic for controlling the pong gameplay
    PongMenuController
    The PongMenuController class contains the logic for handling the non-gameplay-related elements of the pong game, including the forfeit button, back to menu button, and play again button
    PreGameController
    The PreGameController class contains the logic for pre-game screen operations
    RegisterController
    LoginController handles user interactions during the account creation process
    StartScreenController
    The StartScreenController class contains the logic for navigating the start screen of the application
